headlines.description: Yoane Wissa headed a late equaliser after coming on a substitute to earn Brentford a share of the spoils in a 1-1 draw at Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brentford level late at Palace through Yoane Wissa

headlines.description: Aleksandar Mitrovic bagged his 100th goal for Fulham on the way to a 2-1 Premier League win over Brighton & Hove Albion at Craven Cottage Tuesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mitro nets 100th Fulham goal in win over Brighton

headlines.description: Chelsea suffered their second defeat of the Premier League season after giving up an early lead to go down 2-1 at Southampton on Tuesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea give up lead in defeat at Southampton

headlines.description: Leeds United's Luis Sinisterra cancelled out Anthony Gordon's first-half opener for Everton as the two sides drew 1-1 on Tuesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leeds held at home by still-winless Everton
